Segment.name: YNQ
Segment.comment: To identify and answer yes and no questions, including the date, time, and comments further qualifying the condition

Field.name: YesNoConditionOrResponseCode
Field.comment: Code indicating a Yes or No condition or response

Field.name: DateTimePeriodFormatQualifier
Field.comment: Code indicating the date format, time format, or date and time format

Field.name: DateTimePeriod
Field.comment: Expression of a date, a time, or range of dates, times or dates and times

Field.name: CodeListQualifierCode
Field.comment: Code identifying a specific industry code list

Field.name: IndustryCode
Field.comment: Code indicating a code from a specific industry code list

SyntaxNote.name: E010910
SyntaxNote.comment: Only one of YNQ01, YNQ09 or YNQ10 may be present.

SyntaxNote.name: P0304
SyntaxNote.comment: If either YNQ03 or YNQ04 is present, then the other is required.

SyntaxNote.name: C0908
SyntaxNote.comment: If YNQ09 is present, then YNQ08 is required.
